recipe_name: Watermelon and Cucumber Juice with a Spritz of Lime
ingredients: +   1/2 (4 pound) watermelon, seeded and cubed, 4  cucumbers, trimmed and cut into chunks, 2  limes, juiced
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 9mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 31g 11%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 19g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 36mg 180%, Calcium 72mg 6%, Iron 2mg 8%, Potassium 702mg 15%
